dcterms:creator: N. Koenig
A. Howard
dcterms:description: A simulation framework for plants integrated as a plugin within the Gazebo system, enabling the simulation of plant dynamics and their interaction with robotic systems for harvesting tasks.
dcterms:title: Gazebo

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms, providing a variety of environments for training agents.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym

dcterms:creator: V. Makoviychuk
L. Wawrzyniak
Y. Guo
M. Lu
K. Storey

D. Hoeller

A. Allshire

G. State
dcterms:description: A high-performance GPU-based physics simulation environment designed for robot learning, allowing for efficient training and testing of robotic systems.
dcterms:title: Isaac Gym

dcterms:creator: C. W. Bac
J. Hemming
B. van Tuijl
R. Barth
E. Wais
E. J. van Henten
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating the performance of a harvesting robot specifically designed for sweet pepper, providing insights into the effectiveness of robotic harvesting techniques.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data for Sweet Pepper Harvesting

dcterms:creator: R. R. Shamshiri
I. A. Hameed
M. Karkee
C. Weltzien
dcterms:description: A simulation approach for robotic harvesting of fruiting vegetables, utilizing the V-REP platform to develop vision-based control methods.
dcterms:title: V-REP (Virtual Robot Experimentation Platform)

dcterms:creator: J. Iqbal
R. Xu
S. Sun
C. Li
dcterms:description: A simulation of an autonomous mobile robot designed for lidar-based in-field phenotyping and navigation, utilizing the ROS-Gazebo framework.
dcterms:title: ROS-Gazebo
